meanings.sent1: I had to unstick the door by pushing it hard.
meanings.sent2: She used oil to unstick the rusty lock.
meanings.sent3: Trying to unstick a sticker can be quite a challenge.
meanings.sent4: His words helped unstick the knot of fear in her chest.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic had a special tool to unstick the jammed gears.

meanings.sent1: The sticker finally unstuck from the paper.
meanings.sent2: The glue started to unstick after being in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The situation seemed to unstick itself magically.
meanings.sent4: Her mind slowly began to unstick from the worries of the day.
meanings.sent5: The ice cubes unstick from the tray with a gentle twist.
